summary:
This mod I a couple followers I made to it in with my bandit role play character.
The followers are-
Vordi- An elf archer
Grodkig- A Nord warrior
Netch- A female elven archer
Mighty Fugla- Orc warrior
Bogruk- an orc barbarian
descriptionHtml:
This mod I a couple followers I made to it in with my bandit role play character.
To get them, open the console and type "help (characters name) 4"
It should show you the code o one of the followers, then type "player.placeatme (item code) (number)"
As far as I know there are no compatibility issues with any mods.

If you find bugs, such as ugla being invisible contact me so I can fix it.

[size=6]                                   INTALL 
[/size]1. Download my mod
2. extract to your data folder and activate the .esp in the launcher.
author: proreaper1
